code: import*as Yup from'yup';export var AddressSchema=Yup.object({firstName:Yup.string().required(),lastName:Yup.string().required(),address:Yup.string().required(),comment:Yup.string().default('')}).defined();export var OrderItemSchema=Yup.object({productId:Yup.string().required(),count:Yup.number().integer().positive().required()}).defined();export var OrderSchema=Yup.object({id:Yup.string().required(),items:Yup.array().of(OrderItemSchema),address:AddressSchema,status:Yup.string().required()}).defined();
